instance.name: Field Pattern
instance.description: Use a pattern with replacement tokens: [locale], [field:name], [field:reference:name], [date:format]. Example: '[field:category:title]: [field:title] - [date:dd-mm-yyyy]'

instance.name: Set to readonly
instance.description: Do not permit user to change field generated value

instance.name: Separator
instance.description: If using a separator char in the pattern can be used to remove the char in case of the first field is missing

instance.name: Do not update the field if entry is published
instance.description: If the entry is published it will stop the field to be regenerated on every change
